name: United we Stand (Maratus, Wendy Shadowsun)
description:
WIP screenshot :

Fairies and Dwarves must crawl through a dungeon and try to keep everyone alive. 

  • Dungeon Crawler
  • 4 players coop
  • 2 playable races
  • Original OST - http://www.marmamusic.com/ and 
    http://www.demute.studio/
  • Collaboration with Wendy Shadowsun
  • Collaboration with Lycoris - https://www.facebook.com/Lycoris.Art.Drawing/
